text: Lawrence Albert McIntyre (born July 13, 1949) is a former ice hockey defenceman. He played 41 NHL games for the Toronto Maple Leafs. ==External links== * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:Sportspeople from Moose Jaw Category:Toronto Maple Leafs draft picks Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Larry McIntyre
